articles.description: ASTEROID APOPHIS, which has been confirmed by astronomers to pose absolutely no threat to Earth, has been bizarrely branded a biblical sign of prophecy by a Christian evangelist.

articles.author: Aditi Murti
articles.title: The Sea Creature that Cleans Carbon From the Ocean - The Swaddle
articles.description: The giant Larvacean traps carbon in its mucus feeding apparatus, and then discards the carbon-soaked apparatus into the deep seafloor.
articles.content: The giant Larvacean (Bathochordaeus) is a 10-centimeter long tadpole-like creature, but the mucus it secretes can fan out around it by up to one meter. For the larvacean, this is a feeding apparatus,… [+2709 chars]

articles.description: A Near-Earth Object (NEO), the asteroid is called 163348 (2002 NN4) and is classified as a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid (PHA).
